about_the_game:
Edge Of Eternity's Goodies Pack is a collection of digital items related to the game and its universe. It contains:
  • A digital poster of the game by artist Maeka
  • A high quality version of Heryon's World Map
  • Several upcoming free gifts from the developers, which will drop from time to time!
detailed_description:
